Serialized Form

  • Package <Unnamed>

    • Class GameUi extends java.awt.Frame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • frameRate

          int frameRate
          This is the target frame rate for the game.

        • game

          Game game
          An instance of the game being played.

        • gameLock

          java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantLock gameLock
          This is a lock that is used to control access to the game from multiple threads. Since the thread that passes controls to the game and the timer thread are not the same thread, the game instance is at risk for getting called by two threads at the same time. To synchronize access to the game, the lock is here to block the thread until the game instance becomes available again.

        • startupHeight

          int startupHeight
          The height of the window on startup. This is considered HD resolution and it can be expected for most game players.

        • startupWidth

          int startupWidth
          The width of the window on startup. This is considered HD resolution and it can be expected for most game players.

        • timer

          java.util.Timer timer
          The timer controlling the frame rate.

        • view

          GameView view
          The canvas on which the game is rendered.

    • Class GameView extends java.awt.Canvas implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • renderer

          GameRenderer renderer
          Used to render the game.
